message.name: ERR_FV_MODIFY_SERVICE_PLAN_SET_OUTCOME_WHEN_SET_FOR_SUB_GOALS
message.locale: The service plan outcome cannot be defined until an outcome has been set for each of the service plan sub goals.

message.name: ERR_FV_MODIFY_SERVICE_PLAN_CASESTATUS_CLOSED
message.locale: This service plan may not be modified as it has already been closed.

message.name: ERR_FV_MODIFY_SERVICE_PLAN_TYPE_SUBGOALS_ALREADY_ADDED
message.locale: The service plan type may not be modified as sub goals have already been added to this service plan.

message.name: ERR_FV_MODIFY_SERVICE_PLAN_TYPE_CASESTATUS_CLOSED
message.locale: This service plan type may not be modified as it has already been closed.

message.name: ERR_FV_MODIFY_SERVICE_PLAN_GOAL_NOT_DEFINED
message.locale: Goals have not been defined for this type of service plan. Please contact your system administrator.

message.name: ERR_FV_MODIFY_SERVICE_PLAN_GOAL_SUBGOALS_ALREADY_ADDED
message.locale: This service plan goal may not be modified as sub goals have already been added to this service plan.

message.name: ERR_FV_MODIFY_SERVICE_PLAN_GOAL_CASESTATUS_CLOSED
message.locale: This service plan goal may not be modified as it has already been closed.

message.name: ERR_FV_MODIFY_SERVICE_PLAN_GOAL_NOT_EXISTS
message.locale: This service plan cannot be modified as a goal has not been set.

message.name: INF_MODIFY_SERVICE_PLAN_TYPE_RESET_GOAL
message.locale: The service plan goal is no longer appropriate for this type of service plan. Please set a new goal.

message.name: INF_MODIFY_SERVICE_PLAN_GOAL_NOT_EXISTS
message.locale: The service plan cannot not be modified until a goal has been set

message.name: ERR_FV_ADD_SERVICE_PLAN_GOAL_NOT_EXISTS
message.locale: A plan group or sub-goal may not be added to the service plan until a service plan goal has been defined.

message.name: INF_GOAL_CONTRACT_TEXT_MISSING
message.locale: Goal '%1s' contract text is missing from the generated contract because the language specified for the contract text does not match the client's preferred language or the default language used for the system. Please update the client's preferred language or contact your system administrator.

message.name: INF_PLANITEM_CONTRACT_TEXT_MISSING
message.locale: Plan item '%1s' contract text is missing from the generated contract because the language specified for the contract text does not match the client's preferred language or the default language used for the system. Please update the client's preferred language or contact your system administrator.
